name: azure-terraform-diagram
description: Generate Microsoft Azure-style infrastructure diagrams from Terraform projects with DevOps insights

azureTerraformDiagram.theme.description: Diagram color theme (auto follows VS Code theme)

azureTerraformDiagram.excludeResourceTyp.description: Resource types to exclude from diagram (e.g. azurerm_role_assignment)

azureTerraformDiagram.autoGenerateOnSave.description: Automatically generate architecture.png when saving .tf files

azureTerraformDiagram.outputFileName.description: Output file name for the generated diagram

azureTerraformDiagram.scopeToFolder.description: When true, generates diagram for the folder containing the saved .tf file. When false, generates for entire workspace.

azureTerraformDiagram.security.showBadge.description: Show security assessment badges on diagram nodes

azureTerraformDiagram.security.severityT.description: Minimum severity level to show security badges

azureTerraformDiagram.cost.showEstimates.description: Show monthly cost estimates on diagram nodes

azureTerraformDiagram.cost.currency.description: Currency to use for cost estimates

azureTerraformDiagram.showSKULabels.description: Show SKU/tier information on diagram nodes

azureTerraformDiagram.compliance.showTag.description: Show tag compliance badges on diagram nodes

azureTerraformDiagram.compliance.require.description: List of required tags for tag compliance checking

azureTerraformDiagram.network.showCIDR.description: Show CIDR ranges for network resources

azureTerraformDiagram.network.showPrivat.description: Show private endpoint indicators on applicable resources

azureTerraformDiagram.network.showDataFl.description: Show data flow connections between resources

azureTerraformDiagram.layout.mode.description: Layout mode for the diagram (auto, hierarchical, network, or zones)
